text: Samuel W. Pick (born 1936) is an American businessman and politician. He was the mayor of Santa Fe, New Mexico from 1976 to 1978 and again from 1986 to 1994."Former Mayors of Santa Fe", City of Santa Fe (accessed 2015-07-02). ==References== Category:Mayors of Santa Fe, New Mexico Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from Santa Fe, New Mexico
title: Sam Pick
